A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
NO SPOILERS

Star Wars The Last Jedi fails to capitalise on potentially pivotal plot points\, sufers from incoherent and inconclusive writing\, unrelatable and bland characters (interesting ones are misused) a badly written story that does not fit into the established Star Wars universe\, and glaring inconsistensies within itself.

Its only saving grace is the undeniable harmony that exists between John William's legendary score and the cinematography that blends that epic tone with practical computer generated effects perfectly\, which we wish to see more of in Episode IX
